title: buyingtechnow
author: buyingtechnow
content: As the title says this is of people who have Pi in their Mainnet balance. I mined my pi for years! And i finally got KYC and migration and friend of mine told me that i can sell on instagram.com/buypinetworkI sold all i had that migrated since i locked 50%. So around 200 Coins (not a lot but very good) How much did you guys migrate??I sold mine for very good price and i wish i had more. If you have pi on your mainnet wallet, my advice is to sell  since price is amazing, and i receive payment on crypto so WIN WIN Hope i helped someone! Cheers

comments.author: ChuckBuck
comments.body: It's really confusing that there are still so many people putting their trust in a worthless system   How long have you been following it? 5 years ? 5 years on a promise that still doesn't have any real value on exchanges right now? Is that worth your continued trust? your blindness makes me feel so pitiful

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: buyingtechnow on April 30, 2023, 10:38:31 PMAs the title says this is of people who have Pi in their Mainnet balance. I mined my pi for years! And i finally got KYC and migration and friend of mine told me that i can sell on instagram.com/buypinetworkI sold all i had that migrated since i locked 50%. So around 200 Coins (not a lot but very good) Well well well, that should like you trying to promote your scam instagram profile that you are planning to use to scam noobs off their tokensQuote from: ChuckBuck on May 01, 2023, 02:37:31 AMIt's really confusing that there are still so many people putting their trust in a worthless system   How long have you been following it? 5 years ? 5 years on a promise that still doesn't have any real value on exchanges right now? Is that worth your continued trust? your blindness makes me feel so pitiful  Ignorance, not performing due diligence, greed etcSome people are just too hard to advice, so we just let them be until their money is burned.

comments.author: ChuckBuck
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 01, 2023, 11:37:33 PMIgnorance, not performing due diligence, greed etctotally agree with you on this point, but to deceive a large community with millions of people for a long period of time, it is not an easy thing   and they, the people behind that foundation, still do well (swindle) to this day   with the large community and the amount of money they've made over the years, it would have been enough for them to build a real coin, but they didn't  Ignorance is a knife that kills them every day

comments.author: donatien
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 01, 2023, 11:37:33 PMQuote from: buyingtechnow on April 30, 2023, 10:38:31 PMAs the title says this is of people who have Pi in their Mainnet balance. I mined my pi for years! And i finally got KYC and migration and friend of mine told me that i can sell on instagram.com/buypinetworkI sold all i had that migrated since i locked 50%. So around 200 Coins (not a lot but very good) Well well well, that should like you trying to promote your scam instagram profile that you are planning to use to scam noobs off their tokensThat's exactly what came to my mind when I read the post and I think the OP is from Nigeria coz there are so many people from Nigeria on various social media platforms involved in buying and selling pi coins.
